channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Alaska voters deciding a hard-fought race for the state’s only U.S. House seat, election issues
item.description: Alaska voters were deciding a hard-fought race for the state’s only U.S. House seat that could help decide control of that chamber.

item.title: A former Trump aide and a longtime congressman are likely to win in high-profile Georgia races
item.description: A former Donald Trump aide is likely to win election to Congress from Georgia on Tuesday. Meanwhile, a longtime representative will be trying to clinch his 17th term in the House against a former Trump administration official.

item.title: GOP Gov. Jim Justice battles Democrat Glenn Elliott for US Senate seat from West Virginia
item.description: Voters in ruby red West Virginia will decide whether a U.S. Senate seat will flip to the Republicans. Two-term GOP Gov.
